title: Large-Scale Service-Learning-Based Pharmacy Practice Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Program focused on enhancing practical skills for practicing pharmacists through community service-linked activities.

learning_goals: Learners can improve professional communication skills by over 80% participation through collaborative projects with local institutions
Learners can enhance their ability to respond to multicultural patients by achieving over 70 points (out of 100) on cultural competency assessment tools
Learners can effectively apply geriatric patient management competencies in three or more cases through counseling simulations and field practice
Learners can submit a regional health resource utilization plan with over 90% completeness based on analysis of local service agencies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
